profile.name: Dashbit
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Remote Developer | Passionate about Rust and Database Sharding
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a strong background in Python and Rust systems programming. Currently exploring database sharding techniques to improve scalability and performance.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Enphase Energy as a potential employer for Dashbit.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Enphase Energy
description: Designed and implemented a scalable Rust-based system for data processing and analysis.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy new features.
Improved code quality and reduced bugs through rigorous testing and refactoring.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Python-based projects for clients, including data analysis and machine learning applications.
Maintained open-source repositories on GitHub, contributing to the Rust community.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Collaborated with other maintainers to ensure project stability and security.
